name: Hospital Appointment System
body:
### Welcome to Doctor Manager System.
For this project we chose a simple hospital appointment management system. The system connects to a centralized Oracle database, and is used by the receptionist to capture appointment details. The doctor can then access the same system to see his appointments for the day, if any. 

```
$ cd lotrietb/ds3
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout master
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

### Members
We are two students Brandon Lotriet and Clive-Marcus Evertse at The Cape Peninsula University of Technology. This repository was created for the system to keep track of the changes. 

### Restrictions?
No. Anyone who wants to can fork/clone this repository and make changes accordingly.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Have you tried turning it off and on again? If you did, ask professor Google. If you fixed the problem please let us know, so we can fix it too.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
